key_title: Key to the species of Leptinella

breadcrumbs.key_title: Key to the main groups of plants in Victoria
Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Asteraceae

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Asteraceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Asteraceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Peduncle slender, as long as or longer than leaves at anthesis, not elongating in fruit; leaves with petiole more than 2 cm long; primary pinnae of leaves well-spaced; plant glabrous or sparsely hairy
Peduncle stout, usually shorter than leaves at anthesis, elongating in fruit; leaves with petiole to c. 2 cm long; primary pinnae of leaves crowded; plant usually densely hairy
Leaves 1-pinnatisect with pinnae lobed or toothed; ultimate pinnae subacute or obtuse, broad; plant usually glabrous or nearly so
Leaves 3-pinnatisect; ultimate pinnae acute, narrow; plant sparsely hairy
